Package domain

Class Player

java.lang.Object
domain.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MachinePlayer, NormalPlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a player in the game.
Version:
1.8.5
Author:
Juan Daniel Murcia - Mateo Forero Fuentes
See Also:

      public void play(int row, int column) throws GomokuException
      Initiates the player's move with the specified type of token at the given row and column.
      Parameters:
      row - The row to place the token.
      column - The column to place the token.
      typeToken - The type of token to play.
      Throws:
      GomokuException
